thread.title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger should announce exit today or tomorrow, says Alan Smith | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger should announce exit today or tomorrow, says Alan Smith | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger should announce exit today or tomorrow, says Alan Smith | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 4:16 pm Smith thinks Wenger should announce his exit (Picture: Getty) 
Alan Smith has urged Arsene Wenger to announce he will not sign a contract extension with the club in order to secure his Arsenal legacy. 
The French tactician come under fire for a lacklustre performance against Bayern Munich, which saw them be thumped 5-1 by the Bundesliga giants. 
After years of success at the start of his reign, Wenger has struggled to mount a serious Premier League title challenge in the last 10 years and their European form has been largely discouraging. It was a bad night for Arsenal (Picture: Getty) 
Wenger’s current deal expires in the summer and he has kept his cards close to his chest as to whether he will stay or not. 
But after the latest humiliating defeat, former Arsenal striker Smith insists it’s time to go. 
‘I do think we’ve come to the end of a cycle whereby it’s time for a new man with a different voice and new methods,’ he told Sky Sports.
